t: You can now buy Canyon bikes on Amazon | Cycling Weekly
s: 1 month ago - U.S. consumers can now shop for Canyon bikes on Amazon.com. The German direct-to-consumer brand, best known for its high-performance machines ridden by stars like Mathieu van der Poel and Kasia Niewiadoma, is expanding beyond its racing roots to reach a broader audience.
